channel.title: Your best "What the hell is wrong with me!?" moment related to BMS.
channel.description:
-Having non-gamer wifey walk past me, see what site I was on, and say "Isn't that crap OUT yet?"
-Checking the forums on my phone while in an interview with an Office of Civil Rights investigation lawyer (knitting my brow and nodding slowly...)
-Checking in, seeing the Xmas decorations on the Main Page, and keeping it open in the background while I got my work done 'cause I KNEW right when I clicked back there was going to be an update or some news to devour!
-Audible saying "Aw, shit!" when there wasn't anything special, and having to tell my wife why I was saying "Aw, shit!" if front of the kids.
...you?

Not once in my life have I used alt+f4 to close a web browser

You should try it sometimes. It almost feels like you are kicking your browser in the balls which is very satisfying when it fails to work or otherwise annoys you

item.title: Your best "What the hell is wrong with me!?" moment related to BMS.
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
King_Kaddo:

I’m visiting this forum every day.EVERY DAY. EVERY GODDAMN MOTHERFUGHNJDNGAKJNJGnlaDG
I am looking at every fucking thread marked with a red flag. Then I read every crap that has been posted after my last visit. Yes I actually remember the last post I have read.

What’s wrong with that?

Read full topic

item.title: Your best "What the hell is wrong with me!?" moment related to BMS.
item.dc:creator: Givekidsmeth
item.description:
The fact that I still have some hope for this coming out, despite the fact that I was still in high school (and am now attending medical school) when I learned about BMS.

Attention to detail or not, I feel really cheated. I’d rather have donated $20 (and I’m sure thousands of other people would too) and had this thing released three or four years ago at the MAXIMUM.

And nobody else is doing a remake of HL1. Which makes this mod all the more important

Read full topic
